message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you can have a smaller share, but still a fair deal!
Let's meet in the middle, a 50-50 split!
You can have a bit less, I'll take the majority, but it's still a decent deal!
I'll compromise, but I want a slightly bigger share this time!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority, and you'll get a small consolation prize!
I'm not giving up! Let's split it 50-50 again!
